it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.model.match

Class Match

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.common.observer.Observable<ModelUpdate>
      • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.model.match.Match
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer<ModelUpdate>, RemoteObserver<ModelUpdate>, Remote

    public class Match
extends Observable<ModelUpdate>
implements Observer<ModelUpdate>
    Hold the representation of the match. It contains information about:
    • The current turn and the player which is performing it
    • The game board
    • The stacks of cards players can draw, namely:
      • Ammo tiles
      • Weapon cards
      • Powerup cards
    • The number of remaining skulls in the killshots track
    • Whether the match is in frenzy mode or not
    Author:
    Alessandro Fulgini, Lorenzo Farinelli, Tiziano Fucci

      • isPlayerTurn

        public boolean isPlayerTurn(Player player)
        Determines whether the current turn belongs to the provided player. If the player is null or there is no active turn, returns false.
        Parameters:
        player - The object representing the player
        Returns:
        true if the turn belongs to the player, false otherwise

      • isFinalPlayer

        public boolean isFinalPlayer(Player player)
        Checks whether the given player is the last player who has the right to play. This is true if the match is in frenzy mode and he's the last one on the killshot track
        Parameters:
        player - the player
        Returns:
        if this is the last player who has to play

      • suspendPlayer

        public void suspendPlayer(String player)
        Sets a player as suspended
        Parameters:
        player - The username of the player, not null
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the player is not present

      • unsuspendPlayer

        public void unsuspendPlayer(String player)
        Sets a player state to online, whether this was suspended or not doesn't count
        Parameters:
        player - The username of the player, not null
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the player is not present

      • endCurrentTurn

        public void endCurrentTurn()
        Set the state of the current turn to PlayerTurnState.OVER

      • isFrenzy

        public boolean isFrenzy()
        Determines whether the match is in frenzy mode or not
        Returns:
        True if the match is in frenzy mode, false if not

      • goFrenzy

        public void goFrenzy()
        Sets the match to be in frenzy mode, has no effect if it is already in frenzy mode

      • addKillshot

        public void addKillshot(Player player)
        Adds a killshot to the killshots track from the provided player If the minimum number of skulls (0) is reached, this has no effect
        Parameters:
        player - The object representing the player, not null

      • refillBoard

        public void refillBoard()
        Refills all the squares in the board with their items (e.g. weapons, powerups) drawn from the stacks. Calls Square.refill(Match) on each square of the board

      • getPlayers

        public List<Player> getPlayers()
        Retrieves an unmodifiable list of the players participating in the match
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable list of players

        Returns:
        The object representing the player, null if the player does not exist

      • setCurrentTurn

        public void setCurrentTurn(PlayerTurn currentTurn)
        Sets the current turn. A null value will reset the turn sequence, i.e. the first player will be the next selected player when selecting the next turn, so a null value should be passed only for test purposes
        Parameters:
        currentTurn - The object representing the current turn
